experience.description: Managed corporate social media accounts, increasing engagement by 15% through data-driven content scheduling. Collaborated with the creative team to design promotional materials and monitored web traffic analytics to report on campaign ROI.

Assisted in the execution of SEO strategies and keyword research, resulting in a measurable increase in organic search rankings. Drafted weekly email newsletters and performed routine maintenance on the company WordPress site.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
